item.title: Stop Overpaying: 10 Senior Discounts You Probably Missed
item.description: Kohl's, Walgreens, Michaels and more offer deals for people above a certain age.

item.title: Your 401(k) Isn’t an Investment Plan. Here’s What Is
item.description: These accounts offer tax-deferred growth and a high contribution limit, but they also require an investment strategy.

item.title: 15 Everyday Purchases That Secretly Drain Retirees’ Wallets
item.description: Overpriced cell phone plans, unused subscriptions and ATM fees may be eating away at your budget.

item.title: The Smart Shopper’s Guide to Not Overspending at Costco
item.description: Don't buy in bulk without proper planning.

item.title: Why Most Retirees Struggle Without This Simple Bucket Secret
item.description: Allocate your money to short-term, mid-term and long-term goals.
